purpose: This CSS file defines the visual styles for a web application, including layout, typography, and specific element styling such as logos, cards, and text links.

key_content: Global styling for the root element (#root) to center content and set max-width.
Styling for a logo element (.logo), including size, padding, and transition effects.
Hover effects for the logo, applying a drop shadow, with a specific color for React-related logos.
Definition of a keyframe animation (@keyframes logo-spin) for a 360-degree rotation.
Conditional application of the logo-spin animation based on user's motion preferences (@media (prefers-reduced-motion: no-preference)).
Basic padding for a card element (.card).
Color styling for a 'read-the-docs' text element (.read-the-docs).
metadata.summary: The `App.css` file provides core styling for a web application. It establishes a centered, max-width layout for the main content area. It includes detailed styling for a logo, featuring hover-activated drop shadows and an optional spinning animation. Additionally, it defines basic styles for card components and a specific text link, contributing to the overall visual presentation of the application.
